1.title: As Easy as Riding a Bike

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Meet the Host of Life Matters, Dr. Michelle Gordon, as she gets to know her fellow travelers in person for the first time. Join them on their journey as they discover authentic Spanish cuisine and immerse themselves in Spanish culture and the arts while discussing the issues that women face as we age; offering you solutions for a happier and healthier lifestyle. Because your Life Matters

2.title: Away We Go

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Over 7 days, our cast of 7 women will ride the hills of Mallorca with only 3 months to prepare themselves. We begin our adventure by fueling up with Antonio Hidalgo, owner and chef at Reserva Iberica.

3.title: Mallorca, Baby

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: After arriving at Read's Hotel, their final destination in Mallorca, the cast embarks on a new life adventure. The day of the first big ride is at hand. All of their hard work is finally tested.

4.title: Blood, Sweat and Tears

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: The cast of Life Matters face their fears and move toward conquering mountains: both real and perceived and realize more than ever, that it's important never to take life for granted.

5.title: Community: Home and Away

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Community can take many forms. What we thought was important in younger years may not be as important as it is now. We focus on community, relationships and the importance of friendship.

6.title: The Thrill of Victory & the Agony of Defeat

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: We always have the opportunity to embark on new adventures; it's up to us to brave them. We must face our fears, understand the limits we have set for ourselves and defy them.

7.title: Menopause Schmenopause

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: You are never too old to have fun. Join us as we discover Valldemosa and break the silence regarding women's issues.

8.title: That's Just... Gaudi

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Join us as we visit the beautiful city of Barcelona, Spain

9.title: Sunrise, Sunset

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Trying new things is way more fun when you have friends to do it with. The women dip their toes into Spanish culture by trying to learn Flamenco and turns out, it's harder than it looks.

10.title: Aroma Therapy

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: The women learn how to prepare one of Spain's legendary, most mouthwatering dishes: Paella. A comer y provecho!

11.title: You Don't Know What You've Got Until It's Gone

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: The women discover that no matter how well you plan, accidents still happen.

12.title: Cannonballs Aren't Just for Kids

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: Cannonballs are not only for children. There's nothing like jumping into the Mediterranean after some delicious fresh squeezed orange juice and a harrowing ride down a narrow mountain road full of hairpin turns.

13.title: Amigas

episode of.title: Life Matters with Dr. Michelle Gordon (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: Having friends to support when you struggle through life changes is even more important as women age.

imdb.plot outline: Join Dr. Michelle Gordon and her friends as they ride through the hills of Mallorca, Spain and discover authentic Spanish cuisine, immerse themselves in Spanish culture and the arts while they discuss the issues that women face in aging; offering solutions for a happier and healthier lifestyle.
